message:
Project Coordinator needed in an IT Company located in Cairo, Egypt.

Qualifications:
 2-4 years of Project Management experience
 Previous experience in IT industry
 PMP certificate is preferred 

Gender: Male
Salary Range: 2500 – 4000 EGP

To apply:
Jobffers777@hotmail.com
Please write ‘Project Coordinator’ at subject.

#PMP #IT_Jobs #FCI #ITI #Rec #Project_Management_Jobs #Software #IT #PM #JOBS_IN_EGYPT #EGYPT_IT_JOBS #Project_coordinator #WAZAYEF #COMPUTER_SCIENCE #APPS #JOBS #VACANCY #VACANCIES #RECRUITMENT

data.message: That's Called Racism based on sex!  You know if you are in any Foreign country you could get in Jail and pay a very big amount of money for such and announcement!
I've another question: you expect someone who has 2-4 years of project management experience & PMP to accept only 4K?
That degree just without experience is worth 10K at least :)

Dears, First of all thank you for your comments, Second, the gender issue it is based on the client requirements, Third I didn't ask for a project manager I am looking for a project coordinator who have the basic skills of project management. Again Thank your for your comments
